rerun.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a film or television programme that is being shown again on television
rerun.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: We watched a rerun of ‘I Love Lucy.’
rerun.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: something that happens in the same way as something that happened before
rerun.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The government wants to avoid a rerun of last year’s crisis.
rerun.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to show a film or television programme again on television
rerun.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to do something in the same way as before
rerun.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: to arrange for a race or competition to be held again
